about_the_game:
Welcome to the FrogLake

In this RPG you have to save your lake from drying up.
During your journey you will develop your special water powers and find better gear to move on.
The combat system of this game requires you to select 2 action keybinds every turn that you can perform
like:
Attack Jump Skill Item and Run.

Featuring:

  • Unique combat system
  • A big lake to explore
  • Lots of slippy friends to meet
  • Water based magic
  • Catching food with your tongue
  • Lots of sidequests

Not featuring:

  • A level system
  • Random encounters
  • A stable housing market
  • Auto saving (this is a good thing)
detailed_description:
Welcome to the FrogLake

In this RPG you have to save your lake from drying up.
During your journey you will develop your special water powers and find better gear to move on.
The combat system of this game requires you to select 2 action keybinds every turn that you can perform
like:
Attack Jump Skill Item and Run.

Featuring:

  • Unique combat system
  • A big lake to explore
  • Lots of slippy friends to meet
  • Water based magic
  • Catching food with your tongue
  • Lots of sidequests

Not featuring:

  • A level system
  • Random encounters
  • A stable housing market
  • Auto saving (this is a good thing)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: kernel 5.0
  • Processor: 32 or 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Storage: 265 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: kernel 5.0
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 265 GB available space

name: FrogLake

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 32 or 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 270 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 270 MB available space

Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: An RPG about a frog that has to save his lake from drying up. Explore the lake. Go where no frog has gone. Acquire magic water powers.
